title: Animated tribute to Granule typeface
content:
[http://vimeo.com/6746313](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014225907/http:/vimeo.com/6746313 "http://vimeo.com/6746313")

Student Steffen Knoesgaard's Motion Week assignment for Hyper Island was to make a short animation to be completed in an accelerated schedule of only 24 hours based on something that you like.

I am honored that he chose a typeface of mine, and am blown away by the results. Hopefully you will appreciate it as well.

Motion design by Steffen Knoesgaard  
Audio by The Battles & DJ Koze
author: Corey Holms

comments.content:
Very nice. As I understand this one was not commissioned or produced by the foundry but 30 second commercials are a great way to promote fonts I hope we'll be seeing more of that in the coming years.  
Maybe not on national TV.
